\documentclass{standalone}
\usepackage{pgfplots}
\usepackage{textcomp}
\definecolor{falseframe}{RGB}{254,178,76}
\definecolor{correctframe}{RGB}{44,162,95}
\definecolor{falsebit}{RGB}{227,74,51}
\definecolor{correctbit}{RGB}{67,162,202}
\pgfplotsset{compat=newest}
%test
\begin{document}


\begin{tikzpicture} 
\begin{axis}[   x tick label style= {rotate=45,anchor=north east},
				xticklabel interval boundaries,
                ylabel=Fr\'equence,
                xlabel= Oscillations par bit $\div$ Moyenne oscillations par trame erronée $\times$ 10,
                ymin=0, ymax=0.25, ytick = {0,0.02,...,0.24},
                legend style={at={(1.1,0.55)}, anchor=north, legend columns=1}, 
                ybar interval, %bar width=8pt,
                enlarge x limits=-0.1,
                ymajorgrids, grid style={gray!30},
                width=20cm,
                height=15cm]
%\addplot coordinates {(0,2) (0.1,1) (0.3,0.5) (0.35,4) (0.5,3) (0.6,2) (0.7,1.5) (1,1.5)}; 

	\addplot[fill=correctbit!50] table [x=R, y=NNC] {test.dat}; 
	\addplot[fill=correctbit]  table [x=R, y=IIC] {test.dat}; 
	\addplot[fill=falsebit!50]  table [x=R, y=NNE] {test.dat}; 
	\addplot[fill=falsebit]  table [x=R, y=IIE] {test.dat}; 
	\addplot[correctframe,sharp plot,update limits=false, very thick] coordinates {(1,0) (1,0.15)} node[rotate=45] at (axis cs:1.13,0.162) {\textbf{Moyenne}};

	\legend{N\textrightarrow N bit correct, I\textrightarrow I bit correct,N\textrightarrow N bit erron\'e, I\textrightarrow I bit erron\'e}
\end{axis}

\end{tikzpicture}


\begin{tikzpicture} 
\begin{axis}[   x tick label style= {rotate=45,anchor=north east},
                                xticklabel interval boundaries,
                ylabel=Fr\'equence,
                xlabel= Oscillations par bit $\div$ Moyenne oscillations par trame erronée $\times$ 10,
                ymin=0, ymax=0.25, ytick = {0,0.02,...,0.24},
                legend style={at={(1.1,0.55)}, anchor=north, legend columns=1}, 
                ybar interval, %bar width=8pt,
                enlarge x limits=-0.1,
                ymajorgrids, grid style={gray!30},
                width=20cm,
                height=15cm]
%\addplot coordinates {(0,2) (0.1,1) (0.3,0.5) (0.35,4) (0.5,3) (0.6,2) (0.7,1.5) (1,1.5)}; 

        \addplot[fill=correctbit!50] table [x=R, y=NIC] {test.dat}; 
        \addplot[fill=correctbit]  table [x=R, y=INC] {test.dat}; 
        \addplot[fill=falsebit!50]  table [x=R, y=NIE] {test.dat}; 
        \addplot[fill=falsebit]  table [x=R, y=INE] {test.dat}; 

        \addplot[correctframe,sharp plot,update limits=false, very thick] coordinates {(1,0) (1,0.15)} node[rotate=45] at (axis cs:1.13,0.162) {\textbf{Moyenne}};

        \legend{N\textrightarrow I bit correct, I\textrightarrow N bit correct, N \textrightarrow I bit erron\'e, I\textrightarrow N bit erron\'e}
\end{axis}

\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
